sourcesContent:
import * as d3 from 'd3' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function Score(userScore) { const [SvgWeight, setSvgWeight] = useState() useEffect(() => { const SvgWeightCreation = () => { const svg = d3 .select('.score-box') .attr('width', 250) .attr('height', 250) .attr('class', 'bg-gray-50') .style('border-radius', '5px') .append('arc') .attr('innerRadius', '0') .attr('outerRadius', '100') .attr('startAngle', '0') .attr('endAngle', 360 * userScore.userScore) .attr('transform', 'translate(125, 125)') const pie = d3 .pie() .sort(null) .value([userScore.userScore, 1 - userScore.userScore]) const arcPath = d3.arc().outerRadius(97).innerRadius(87) const path = svg .append('path') .attr('d', arcPath) .attr('stroke', '#fff') .attr('stroke-width', 3) } setSvgWeight(SvgWeightCreation) }, []) return (
{console.log(userScore.userScore)}
) } export default Score
